data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Sendai.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Sendai drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Corner awarded to Shonan.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Sendai.
Shonan's Temma Matsuda misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
In the minute 6, Hajime Matsuo awards the away team a throw-in.
Takuya Okamoto of Shonan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hajime Matsuo awards Sendai a goal kick.
In the minute 7, In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Shonan takes a corner from the left.
Shonan are pushing forward but Sosuke Shibata's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 8, Sendai have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Sendai throw-in in Shonan's half.
In the minute 10, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sendai.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Sendai.
In the minute 14, Shonan to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo has awarded Shonan a corner.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Shonan throw-in in Sendai's half.
In the minute 19, Shonan to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Temma Matsuda (Shonan) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Shonan are coming forward and Temma Matsuda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 20, Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Shonan's Taiga Hata is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Sendai.
In the minute 24, Hajime Matsuo has awarded Sendai a corner.
Hayato Teruyama (Sendai) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Shonan at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 27, Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shonan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sendai.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 31, Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Shonan takes a corner from the right.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Sendai.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
In the minute 37, Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Goal kick for Shonan at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 40, Free kick Sendai.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 42, Can Sendai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
Shonan takes a corner from the right.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Shonan throw-in in Sendai's half.
In the minute 44, Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Sendai make their first substitution with Kim Jung-Ya replacing Ryutaro Iio.
Takayoshi Ishihara is replacing Takumi Sasaki for the home team.
Yuki Ohashi is on a sub for Hiroto Nakagawa for Shonan.
In the minute 48, Takayoshi Ishihara of Sendai smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Hajime Matsuo has awarded Shonan a corner.
Temma Matsuda (Shonan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Shonan.
Sosuke Shibata of Shonan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 52, Shonan pushes forward through Naoki Ishihara, whose finish on goal is saved.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sendai.
Sendai are coming forward and Yoshiki Matsushita gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 53, Shonan have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 55, Sendai attack but Shun Nagasawa's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
Throw-in Shonan.
In the minute 56, Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Sendai advance rapidly upfield but Hajime Matsuo blows for offside.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Hajime Matsuo awards Sendai a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Shonan have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Shonan's Kazunari Ono attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Sendai have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Shonan at Yurtec Stadium.
Free kick Sendai.
Takashi Kiyama is making the team's third substitution at Yurtec Stadium with Isaac Cuenca replacing Hiroto Yamada.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Shonan.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sendai.
In the minute 71, Sendai to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In Sendai, Shun Nagasawa (Sendai) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Shonan throw-in in Sendai's half.
In the minute 72, Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo waits before resuming play because Keiya Shiihashi for Sendai is still down.
Keiya Shiihashi, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Takuma Hamasaki is the substitute for Sendai.
In the minute 76, Shonan push upfield but Hajime Matsuo quickly pulls them for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
At Yurtec Stadium, Shonan are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 78, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo awards Sendai a goal kick.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 81, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sendai.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
In the minute 85, Free kick for Shonan in the half of Sendai.
Yoshiki Matsushita (Sendai) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) is making a fifth substitution, with Alexandre Guedes replacing Kunimitsu Sekiguchi.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Shonan.
The match at Yurtec Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Hirokazu Ishihara, who is down injured.
In the minute 89, The away team have replaced Takuya Okamoto with Shota Kobayashi. This is the second substitution made today by Bin Ukishima.
The away team replace Naoki Yamada with Mitsuki Saito.
Hirokazu Ishihara is back on his feet again.
At Yurtec Stadium the fourth official shows that 7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Important block from the Sendai defence as Naoki Ishihara fires in a strike for Shonan.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Sendai's Shun Nagasawa gets in a shot on goal at Yurtec Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Isaac Cuenca (Sendai) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sendai are pushing forward but Isaac Cuenca's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Free kick Shonan.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
At Yurtec Stadium, Simao has been yellow-carded for the home team.
